verbs.description: [V: removing] [ARG1: adhesive] [ARG2: from painted wood price stickers decorative stickers and name badges] all have an adhesive back that sticks to surfaces either purposely or by accident removing the stickers typically involves peeling the sticker off the surface although the sticker is no longer on the surface the tacky adhesive residue remains
